data.text: @SenatorRicketts They should but they are incapable of doing that because the REPULSIVE orange thing in office is a disgusting liar and the GOP are spineless COWARDS.

@SenatorRicketts Where the fuck have you been?  All of the sudden you think this white house would do what anyone (normal) would do when they make a mistake.
This admin (and anyone who supports it . . . inside and outside of the government) is rotten to the core.

@co3blue @SenatorRicketts Back to the very fine people hoax … wow.   You should really watch that video again … the next line you never saw … will open your eyes a bit about the media.   Seriously watch it.

https://t.co/CtO2RcLjU0
@DGC_2020 @SenatorRicketts So a staffer has access to his photo and account and posts in the middle the night? How stupid are you?
@eRtwngr @SenatorRicketts The comparison of apes to black people is the OG of racist tropes. Doesn't matter if you don't think so.
@hodge_bc @SenatorRicketts Buy in the community not just fancy stuff... And you heard real racism. That's the dumbest shit ever.
@OutLikeA_Lamb @SenatorRicketts The comparison of apes to black people is the OG of racist tropes. White people have never had that as a racist comparison. Don't be a fucking moron.
